title: Edom Naturally Scientific Dead Sea Mineral Salt Soap from Israel
features: Edom Dead Sea is a rejuvenating and revitalizing skin care products range rich in minerals from the Dead Sea blended with vitamins and oils. Contains no animal fats.

Dead Sea salt soap from Israel can be applied to both face and body. Suitable for daily use and for all skin types.
description: Edom Dead Sea Mineral Soap Rich in minerals and natural vegetable ingredients. Contains no animal fats. The deep cleaning action leaves the skin fresh and revitalized. Dead Sea salt soap can be used for both body and face and is recommended to use in conjunction with the Moisturizing Day Cream when used on the face or the Mineral Body Lotion when used on the body. Suitable for all skin types.
